thothbot.parallax.plugins.postprocessing.shaders

Class VerticalBlurShader

  • java.lang.Object
    • thothbot.parallax.core.client.shaders.Shader
      • thothbot.parallax.plugins.postprocessing.shaders.VerticalBlurShader

  • public final class VerticalBlurShader
extends Shader
    Two pass Gaussian blur filter (horizontal and vertical blur shaders)

    Described in gamerendering.com and used in cake23.de

    Based on three.js code

    • 9 samples per pass
    • standard deviation 2.7
    • "h" and "v" parameters should be set to "1 / width" and "1 / height"
    Author:
    thothbot
